about_the_game:
Welcome to Rock Digger, the cozy mining adventure where you play as a rock!
Explore procedurally generated planets, dig for minerals, use them to upgrade your body with Alchemy. Unearth lost Alien technologies and powers. Throw a billion pickaxes? Try to dig deep enough to reach the core of the planet.

Dig

You somehow find an infinite stack of pickaxes.
Throw them at walls to dig. Upgrade them. Charge them up to throw a Mega Pickaxe. Find a Pickgatling? And more!

Upgrades and Technologies

You start with nothing - not even legs! Nor life. But you'll be able to uncover countless new powers, alien technologies, and to upgrade your abilities to unreasonable levels. Start as a humble rock, evolve into a rock god!

No Timer

Rock Digger is a game all about digging. Take all the time you want.
Nothing awaits you at the surface, and you don't have to defend from monster attacks!

Puzzles and Games

While exploring underground, you will often run into puzzles or even mini games! Use a variety of abilities to interact with these, and earn rewards!

Explore Alien Worlds

The alien world where you first crash-land contains numerous biomes and hidden secrets to discover, there is plenty to explore. And when you're done, uncover brand-new worlds with more biomes and secrets!

Survive a Hostile Environment

In this game, you won't encounter any enemy. But proceed with caution, as nature itself can be a deadly threat. Venture too deep without proper preparation, and the darkness will start to harm you. One wrong step could send you falling into a pit of lava. Stay prepared, stay alert and stay alive!

name: Rock Digger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 2.2Ghz or higher with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan 1.0 or OpenGL 3.3 support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Start as a humble rock and evolve into a rock-digging rock star! Dig for resources, solve ancient puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets after crash-landing on an alien planet. Unearth countless upgrades and gain powerful abilities. Explore mysterious new worlds. Reach the core. Ascend to Rock God!
